name: Consecrated Scorpion
title: Remnant Venom: Consecrated Scorpion
desc: A poisonous scorpion that became twisted and warped by eating some great being. It now commands perilous lightning.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Consecrated Scorpion

skills.name: Stinging Spine
skills.desc:
Deals 3 Physical DMG.
Create 1 Bonecruncher's Energy Block card and randomly place it within the top 2 cards of your deck.

skills.name: Thunderbore Blast
skills.desc: Deals 3 Physical DMG. Discard up to 3 Bonecruncher's Energy Block cards from your Hand, and create 1 Thunderbore Trap on the opposing side of the field.

skills.name: Immortal Remnants: Electro
skills.desc: (Passive) When the Round ends, create 2 Bonecruncher's Energy Block cards and randomly place them within the top 10 cards of your deck.
